alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Caldwell; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 08 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Caldwell, southeastern Travis and northwestern Bastrop Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mustang Ridge, or 11 miles northeast of Lockhart, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Rollingwood, Mustang Ridge, Niederwald, Cedar Creek, Wyldwood, Hornsby Bend, Webberville, Creedmoor, Garfield, Rockne, Maha, Del Valle, Pilot Knob, Cedar Hills, McKinney Falls State Park, Lytton Springs, St John Colony and Mendoza. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
